Alexis Sanchez could reportedly be denied a dream move to Real Madrid – because the Madrid squad do not want him.
The Chilean has emerged as one of the La Liga giants’ top targets for the January window, according to Don Balon.
Apparently Madrid are looking to bring in a new No.9 and have already opened talks over a switch for the Arsenal ace.
However, the players at Real have wasted little time in letting club chiefs no that they are not keen on his arrival.
And Sergio Ramos has been leading the charge in convincing Madrid officials not to make a move for the 28-year-old.
They feel that his signing could impact the playing time of fan favourite and the hugely popular Karim Benzema.
